overview: The feature film You'll Be Sorry is a unique encounter with 55 captivating films. A 2 1/2 hour feature film, You'll Be Sorry weaves together pieces of many movies and results in a brand new creation. The goal of You'll Be Sorry is to evoke similar responses to those predicted by the tuxedo-clad presenter in the opening of James Whales' Frankenstein: "I think it will thrill you. It may shock you. It might even horrify you."
title: You'll Be Sorry
